items.title: Texas School Administrators Use A.I. To Ban Books Like TO KILL A MOCKINGBIRD
items.description: Leander Independent School District's administrators tell educators to "pause" use of 40 books, including numerous classroom classics.

items.title: Books to Read With Your Book Club for Latine History Month and Beyond
items.description: There's a genre-bending tale set in Havana and Cambridge, a darkly funny memoir-in-essays, and even a fun rom-com.

items.title: Gothic Novels About the Horror of Compulsory Heterosexuality
items.description: The troubling of domesticity in gothic novels pairs perfectly with the quiet, suffocating horror of compulsory heterosexuality.

items.title: The Greatest Dystopian Thrillers of All Timeâ€”and More SFF Links
items.description: The best dystopian thriller movies, eco-horror, a witchy sapphic romance, underrated sci-fi shows, and more SFF links!

items.title: Reading For Pleasure Hits a 20-Year Low, and More News for Library Workers
items.description: A new study has found that only 16% of American adults reported reading for pleasure on any given day, the lowest rate in 20 years.
